name: Brickin' Out! - DEMO
description:
Brickin' Out! is a 3D 'bottom-up' remake of an Atari classic called Breakout. It's my first video game and is still in development. 

This version is only one level and has 64 bricks to destroy, but only three lives to do it. 

There are no power ups as of yet, but that is in development, as well as additional levels, game modes, and overall polish (i.e., SFX, music, lighting, etc.).

Please let me know how I can improve the game; I'm open to any and all suggestions and criticisms.

I hope you enjoy it. Thank you for taking the time to play my demo.
